name: Amaranth
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Onions, corn, peppers, egg plant, tomatoes

name: Angelica
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 18 months. Angelica archangelica has slightly dull leaves, not shiny..
compatibility: Any herbs that like damp, shady areas - mint, lemon balm

name: Artichokes
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Needs a lot of space. Best in separate bed

name: Asparagus
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant as crowns.
harvest: Harvest in 2-3 years. Plant 'crowns' to harvest earlier .

name: Asparagus Pea
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-11 weeks. Pick early, pick often.

name: Basil
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 10-12 weeks. Pick before flowering.

name: Beans - climbing
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Sweetcorn, spinach, lettuce, summer savory, dill, carrots, brassicas, beets, radish, strawberry, cucumbers, zucchini, tagates minuta (wild marigold)
avoid: Alliums (Chives, leek, garlic, onions), Florence fennel

name: Beans - dwarf
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 7-10 weeks. Pick often to encourage more flower production.
compatibility: Sweetcorn, spinach, lettuce, summer savory, dill, carrots, brassicas, beets, radish, strawberry and cucumbers, tagates minuta (wild marigold)

name: Beetroot
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Onions, Silverbeet (Swiss Chard), Lettuce, Cabbage, Dwarf Beans, Dill, Peas. Strawberries

name: Borage
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Use leaves before flowers appear, otherwise they will be 'hairy'. .
compatibility: Strawberry, tomatoes, zucchini/squash. Deters pests from many plants.

name: Broad Beans
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 12-22 weeks. Pick frequently to encourage more pods.

name: Broccoli
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 10-16 weeks. Cut flowerhead off with a knife..
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, oregano)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Brussels sprouts
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 14-28 weeks. Pick sprouts when small. .
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chili, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Burdock
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Cabbage
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, thyme)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chili, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard, parsnip

name: Cape Gooseberry
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Will happily grow in a flower border but tends to sprawl over other plants.

name: Capsicum
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 10-12 weeks. Cut fruit off with sharp knife.
compatibility: Egg plant (Aubergine), Nasturtiums, Basil, Parsley, Amaranth

name: Cardoon
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Carrot
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Onions, Leeks, Lettuce, Sage, Peas, Radishes, Tomatoes, Beans, Celery, Rosemary

name: Cauliflower
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chili, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Celeriac
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Beans, brassicas, carrots, leeks, lettuce, peas, sage, tomatoes, onions

name: Celery
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Not applicable as celery needs to be close together to encourage blanching.

name: Chicory
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 16-24 weeks. Will need forcing before final harvest.

name: Chilli peppers
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 9-11 weeks. Wear gloves to pick 'hot' chilies.
compatibility: Best grown in a separate bed as chillis need plenty of light and air circulation.

name: Chinese cabbage
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow direct in the garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Harvest whole head or you can take a few leaves at a time.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, coriander), lettuce, potatoes
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Chives
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Choko/Chayote
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant whole mature fruit when one produces a shoot at one end..
harvest: Harvest in approximately 17 weeks. Best when fruit is light green and not more than 6cm long.

name: Collards
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chili, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Coriander
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Corn Salad
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Cowpeas
sowing: Easy to grow. When soil begins to warm up. After frosts finish.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Cucumber
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Cut fruit off with scissors or sharp knife.
compatibility: Nasturtiums, Beans, Celery, Lettuce, Sweet Corn, Cabbages, Sunflowers, Coriander, Fennel, Dill, Sunflowers

name: Daikon
sowing: Easy to grow. Direct in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Dig daikon carefully. They are rather brittle..
compatibility: Chervil, cress,lettuce, leeks, spinach, strawberries, tomatoes

name: Dill
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-12 weeks. Use leaves before flowering.

name: Eggplant
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 12-15 weeks. Cut fruit with scissors or sharp knife.

name: Endive
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: beans, brassicas, carrots, cucumbers, chervil, sage.

name: Fennel
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Florence Fennel
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: French tarragon
sowing: Plant cuttings or root division.
harvest: Harvest in 30-40 days. Pick leaves when young for best flavour.

name: Garlic
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant cloves.
compatibility: Beets, Carrots, Cucumbers, Dill, Tomatoes, Parsnips

name: Ginger
sowing: Plant pieces of fresh root showing signs of shoots.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 25 weeks. Reduce water as plant dies back to encourage rhizome growth.

name: Horseradish
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant root pieces.
harvest: Harvest in 16-24 weeks. Some improvement in flavour if left till after frost..

name: Jerusalem Artichokes
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant tubers about 5cm (1.5") deep..

name: Kale
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, camomile)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Kohlrabi
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Leeks
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 15-18 weeks. Loosen with a fork rather than pull by hand..

name: Lemon Balm
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Cut back tall stems to prevent flowering.

name: Lettuce
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden, or start in seed trays and plant out in 4-6 weeks.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Carrots, Onions, Strawberries, Beets, Brassicas, Radish, Marigold, Borage, Chervil, Florence fennel, leeks.

name: Luffa
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 11-12 weeks. Use as a back scratcher.

name: Marrow
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Mint
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in trays and plant out or start from cuttings. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-12 weeks. Cut leaves from top with scissors.

name: Mizuna
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Mustard greens
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, camomile)
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chilli, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry

name: NZ Spinach
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Pick the tips.

name: Okra
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Onion
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 25-34 weeks. Allow onions to dry before storing.
compatibility: Lemon Balm, Borage, Carrots, Beets, Silverbeet, Lettuce, Amaranth

name: Oregano
sowing: Sow in garden, or start in seed trays. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 6-8 weeks. When flowers appear.

name: Pak Choy
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility:
Dwarf (bush) beans, beets, celery, cucumber, onions, marigold, nasturtium, rhubarb, 
aromatic herbs (sage, dill, chamomile, coriander), lettuce, potatoes
avoid: Climbing (pole) beans, tomato, peppers (chili, capsicum), eggplant (aubergine), strawberry, mustard

name: Parsley
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 9-19 weeks. Cut stalks from outer part of plant.

name: Parsnip
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 17-20 weeks. Best flavour if harvested after a frost..
compatibility: Swiss Chard (Silverbeet), Capsicum, Peas, Potatoes, Beans, Radishes, Garlic

name: Peas
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 9-11 weeks. Pick the pods every day to increase production.

name: Potato
sowing: Plant tuber.
harvest: Harvest in 15-20 weeks. Dig carefully, avoid damaging the potatoes.
compatibility: Peas, Beans, Brassicas, Sweetcorn, Broad Beans, Nasturtiums, Marigolds

name: Pumpkin
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Radish
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Chervil, cress,lettuce, leeks, spinach, strawberries, tomatoes

name: Rhubarb
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant pieces of rhizome or roots 8 - 10 cm (3 - 4 in.) deep.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. You will have a stronger plant if you leave it for about a year before using..

name: Rocket
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Rockmelon
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Rosella
sowing: Sow in garden, or start in seed trays. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Rosemary
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant cuttings .
harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. In warmer areas, harvest time might be shorter.

name: Rutabaga
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Sage
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 18 months. Time reduced if grown from cuttings.
compatibility: Broccoli, Cauliflower, Rosemary, Cabbage and Carrots

name: Salsify
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Beans, Brassicas, Carrots, Celeriac, Endive, Kohl-rabi, Leeks, Lettuce, Alliums, Spinach

name: Savory - summer savory
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in Garden. Lightly cover.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 6-10 weeks. Cut before flowers form for best flavour.

name: Savory - winter savory
sowing: Easy to grow. Start in trays. Cover seed lightly.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 6-10 weeks. Use the leaves fresh..

name: Shallots
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant small bulblets,  with stem just showing above ground.
harvest: Harvest in 12-15 weeks. Keep a few for your next planting.
compatibility: Lemon Balm, Borage, Carrots, Beets, Silverbeet, Lettuce, Amaranth

name: Silverbeet
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Beans, brassica sp. (cabbage, cauliflower, etc), tomato, allium sp. (onion, garlic, chives), lavender, parsnip
avoid: Corn, melon, cucurbit (cucumbers, squash, melons, gourds), most herbs, potato.

name: Snow Peas
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Carrots, Endive, Florence fennel, Winter lettuce, Brassicas.

name: Spinach
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Broad beans (fava), cabbage, cauliflower, celery, eggplant (aubergine), onion, peas, strawberry, santolina

name: Spring onions
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Lemon Balm, Borage, Carrots, Beets, Silverbeet, Lettuce, Amaranth

name: Squash
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Strawberries from seeds
sowing: Start inside in pots or trays after chilling seeds.. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 1 years. Seedlings need to grow for about a year before fruiting. Remove first flowers. .
compatibility: Better in a bed on their own to allow good sun and air circulation
avoid: If you are using rotation beds then avoid putting strawberries where you have grown tomatoes, potatoes, peppers or eggplant

name: Strawberry Plants
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant with crown (of roots) just covered..
harvest: Harvest in approximately 11 weeks. Strawberries bruise easily when ripe, handle carefully. Pick with a small piece of stem attached..
compatibility: Better in a bed on their own to allow good sun and air circulation
avoid: If you are using rotation beds, avoid putting strawberries where you have grown tomatoes, potatoes, peppers or eggplant

name: Sunflower
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Sweet corn
sowing: Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: All beans, cucumber, melons, peas, pumpkin, squash, amaranth

name: Sweet Marjoram
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 8-10 weeks. Best flavour if picked before flowering.

name: Sweet Potato
sowing: Plant shoots or cuttings (Slips).

name: Taro
sowing: Plant small pieces of tuber or suckers, 5-8cm deep.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 28 weeks. When the leaves begin to die down. .

name: Thyme
sowing: Grow in seed trays and plant out 6-8 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 42-52 weeks. Root divisions ready in 3 months.

name: Tomatillo
sowing: Easy to grow. Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 10-14 weeks. Husk splits when fruit is ripe..
compatibility: Will happily grow in a flower border

name: Tomato
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Asparagus, Chervil,Carrot, Celery, Chives, Parsley, Marigold, Basil

name: Turnip
sowing: Easy to grow. Sow in garden. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
compatibility: Peas, Beans, Chives, Spinach, Carrots, Chicory

name: Watermelon
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.

name: Yacon
sowing: Easy to grow. Plant sprouting root/tuber to a depth of about 4cm and mulch to cover.
harvest: Harvest in approximately 25 weeks. You can collect a few at a time without digging out the whole plant..

name: Yam/Oca
sowing: Plant tubers about 5cm (1.5") deep covered with soil.
harvest: Harvest in 15-20 weeks. Leave in the ground until foliage has completely died down so tubers reach maximum size.

name: Zucchini
sowing: Grow in seed trays, and plant out in 4-6 weeks. Sow seed at a depth approximately three times the diameter of the seed.
harvest: Harvest in 6-9 weeks. Cut the fruit often to keep producing.
compatibility: Corn, beans, nasturtiums, parsley, Silverbeet, Tomatoes
